name: Flying to the Mt. Everest
description: There are no words to describe how you feel when flying over the Himalaya; you are left in awe of the sheer magnitude of the mountain chain and its incredible beauty. One begins to understand the real meaning of ‘fascinating’. After seeing the awesome panoramic view of the Himalayas your mouth remains wide opened. You will totally be amazed by the scenery of snow-capped mountains right in front of your eyes.
